name: Avast Ye!
description:
Avast Ye! Is a face paced, plundering pirate platformer.

You play as Pete the Peg Legged Plunderer, a pirate searching the treasure islands on his quest to find the fortune of the legendary pirate White Moe.

Pete navigates his way through dangerous caves avoiding traps and enemies, searching for treasure.

He uses his hook to climb walls and his peg leg cannon to double jump and slide attack his enemies.

The challenging levels will have the player dying over and over, building frustration, making is so much more satisfying when a level is completed.
